str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Perhaps from a and the base of meros; properly, to miss the mark, i.e. to err, especially to sin.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Seven times. Adverb from hepta; seven times.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
Seven times. Adverb from hepta; seven times.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From epi and strepho; to revert.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
